mapper.select: select * from hobby where id=#{id} and hobby=#{hobby}
select hobby from hobby where id=#{id}
select * from hobby order by id
mapper.delete: delete from hobby where id=#{id} and hobby=#{hobby}
mapper.update: update hobby set hobby=#{modifyHobby} where id=#{id} and hobby=#{hobby}
mapper.select: select id from customer order by id
